titleStmt.title: An elegy vpon the unhappy losse of the noble Earle of Essex
titleStmt.author: Twiss, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Benson, and are to be sold at his shop in Dunstanes Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2535 bound and filmed following Wing M2986A and preceeding Wing G3 (not in reel guide).
Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
